_header: Welcome be ye when ye go
_description: Satirical verses against his Mistress — two 8-line stanzas (abababab)

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
Welcome be ye whan ye goofare wel whan ȝe
                    come…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…ffare welle no more for you I carebut pray yow of my songe
                    have no desdeyn
